html:
1.27.24  2:22 am   i saw some cool clothes but then i saw they were too expensive sad face

      there's great news, less expensive clothes are more cool

1.26.24  10:43 pm   What is the difference between noodles and pasta?

      sometimes nothing

1.26.24  10:15 pm   what did you do today?

      wrote some fake stories

1.26.24  8:05 pm   All my favorite artists have stories about themselves getting in trouble during childhood because they would be drawing in their notebook or getting distracted because they would rather be at home playing piano rather than at gradeschool. Is it possible to have this kind of dedication to hobbies in my more cynical years?

     sure

      I feel like I spent too much of my childhood being imaginative instead of creative.

     i wouldn't consider those to be opposites, but it sounds like you value both, based on what you've said so far

1.26.24  7:30 pm   do you think?

      i'd be willing to give it a try

1.26.24  5:52 pm   What if dinosaurs were still alive 

      then all the other animals would be a little different

1.26.24  3:34 pm   So many things are funky. How many do you think are funky?

      i actually can't think of anything that is funky

1.26.24  1:43 pm   I see you're answering so many questions here. Why not take a break and not answer this one? 

      i'll see what i can do

1.26.24  1:09 pm   what is your favorite flower

      makes me wonder if there is some kind of super flower

1.26.24  10:41 am   What are your 3 favorite types of normal water?

      it's a tie between poland spring, deer park, and arrowhead. not a sponsor. just a product of moderate to average quality

1.26.24  8:17 am   Hi Bill, I'm starting to learn guitar and I was wondering if you have any tips for how to play. I was thinking about playing some chords from "More Then a Dream" (my personal favorite!). 

      as long as you start to enjoy having the instrument in your hand, you're gonna be fine

1.26.24  1:41 am   would you consider going on tour?

      maybe

1.26.24  1:36 am   i feel so sad these days for reasons out of my control is it worth continuing on to see if maybe things get better someday

      yes

1.26.24  12:07 am   how do you feel about ferris wheels?

      they are apparently portable

1.25.24  11:59 pm   Opinion on swimming?

      classic

1.25.24  11:47 pm   do you skateboard?

      no, but i could

1.25.24  11:08 pm   how to deal with disappointment

      start now, building something new

1.25.24  10:13 pm   my life is a trainwreck, which star sign do i praise to solve my problems?

      the middle one

1.25.24  9:04 pm   How whimsical can life get?

      all the way

1.25.24  8:12 pm   Why is saying "waffling" so much fun

      that's one of the many great gifts to reward you for being alive

1.25.24  8:09 pm   what should i feed my goats

      how about a leaf

1.25.24  6:47 pm   Are hexagons or octagons better?

      put it this way, they are at least as good as things

1.25.24  5:19 pm   what is the song that the i said it three or four songs ago part in got some money references?

      so the song is written so that you can pretend it's written from your perspective

1.25.24  5:09 pm   how do i bridge the gap between writing down words and singing them? .. actually maybe the more i think about it maybe i could do it but still do u have any advice 

      it's quite simple. start singing words. the more you sing words the better you will get at singing words

1.25.24  1:35 pm   do you know any musicians who not only inspired your music, but also kind of inspired some of your personality or values?

      it's a lot of different people, for fleeting moments

1.25.24  1:01 pm   whats your opinion on four-dimensional space 

      it's fine

1.25.24  11:33 am   on average how may times a day do you doubt yourself

      i'm not sure

1.25.24  11:13 am   I wonder if you put something dirty on soap, would you need another soap to get it off?

     no

     Would it get the other soap dirty as well?

     a little

     Would the two soaps merge into one gigantically dirty soap?

      no

1.25.24  10:34 am   Is the yeti and the abominable snowman the same guy? 

      i have no idea

1.25.24  10:18 am   Do you ever challenge yourself to explore musical ideas from various world regions, such as african rhythms, arabic harmonies, etc.? 

      i don't consider that a challenge, i consider it enjoyment

1.25.24  9:39 am   What is your favourite chord? I like D7(#9)

      what i like best is to use many different chords

1.25.24  9:31 am   do you like Bossa Nova? 

      could happen

1.25.24  9:00 am   How does one make connections?

      just get out there and start having a wild time

1.25.24  7:08 am   How many marbles do you need to lose before you have officially "lost your marbles"?

      more than 90%

1.25.24  6:54 am   Have you ever played Mario Kart and if so are you good at it

      i have played 2 of the mario kart games extensively and developed some high skills at one time

1.25.24  5:10 am   Will you ever do a tiny desk concert

      no but i'd be glad to perform at a regular sized desk

1.25.24  2:11 am   is there a way to tip a object for doing whatever its doing

      i don't think so

1.25.24  1:57 am   how to make synths sound psychedelic and trippy dear billy wurtzy

      the authentic way to create this, of course, is to trip and then find the dials

1.25.24  12:28 am   i experience nightmares on a fairly regular basis. it happens so often i've just become indifferent to them. but when i tell people this they tell me this is a sign of mental strife and/or a bad omen in general. am i okay or am i like cursed or something?

      maybe a little of both

1.25.24  12:03 am   have you ever modeled a subway train?

      no but that sounds like something i would do

1.25.24  12:01 am   what even is a good measure for productivity like it's so hard not to get lost in research rabbit holes

      procedures

1.24.24  11:20 pm   how often might these questions give you inspiration for future projects?

      i don't recall that ever happening

1.24.24  11:14 pm   I've heard about the idea to have an idea journal, but what do I do with my ideas if I'm ever in a place that isn't journal-accessible?

      maybe you could bring a secret journal there

1.24.24  11:02 pm   have you considered writing songs in different genres?

      yes but the genre system is so delicate, i find that it breaks if you even touch it, or look at it or breathe on it

1.24.24  10:07 pm   What is a soda you have never drunk?

      baking

1.24.24  9:46 pm   i had a dream i brough my trumpet to a jam but when it was time to play i was like nevermind i'm not any good at trumpet i don't want to play. a while later i remembered i can sing and i asked if they could play something i can sing and they were like no we don't do that here. much like in that dream, i don't feel like i'm in a place where my talents and skills are appreciated. maybe i have to make the place but that sounds exhausting. i'm not sure making a place for myself is in my skillset.

     has to be either place making, place finding, or place adapting. or the secret 4th option of course, which is to be miserable

     i hope i find what i am looking for, y'know?

      yes

1.24.24  7:29 pm   If you could be a bird which one would you be? And if that doesn't tickle your fancy then what type of tree would you be?

      i'm not ready to make those decisions yet

1.24.24  4:09 pm   I've been making music for a couple years now and i often reach the point where the MIDI input lag gets too much because of all the effects and instruments, so I end up leaving the song at whatever state its in out of frustration.

I just learned what "freezing" a track is in a DAW. I'm so mad i didn't know this (frankly obvious) thing sooner. Now i'm scared that there are other obvious things I don't know and I don't know what I don't know. Did this sort of thing happen to you.

     yes

     Has it stopped happening to you?

     no

     Will it ever stop???

     no

1.24.24  4:07 pm   Do you have any tips on how to motivate oneself for working on a massive project, without it becoming boring over time?

      no

1.24.24  4:00 pm   Do you ever have a moment where you're listening to a good song and wish you wrote it so stop listening to the song to then go work on music?

      i believe so
